tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_donations DECIMAL(10, 2),
  total_volunteers INT
);

CREATE TABLE philanthropic_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    program_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    metric_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES philanthropic_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE program_metrics (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_donations DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_volunteers INT
);

CREATE TABLE donor_data (
    donor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    donation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    donation_date DATE,
    program_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_metrics(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE volunteer_data (
    volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    volunteer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    volunteer_email VARCHAR(255),
    hours_volunteered DECIMAL(5, 2),
    program_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_metrics(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProgramMetrics (
 program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 program_category VARCHAR(50),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 total_donations DECIMAL(10,2),
 total_beneficiaries INT
);

CREATE TABLE Donor (
 donor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 donor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 donor_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
 donor_phone VARCHAR(20),
 total_donations DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Beneficiary (
 beneficiary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 beneficiary_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ProgramParticipation (
 program_id INT,
 beneficiary_id INT,
 donation_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
 PRIMARY KEY (program_id, beneficiary_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES ProgramMetrics(program_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (beneficiary_id) REFERENCES Beneficiary(beneficiary_id)
);

CREATE TABLE program_metrics (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_funding DECIMAL(10, 2),
  success_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_metrics (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  grant_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  grant_date DATE,
  recipient_name VARCHAR(255),
  CONSTRAINT fk_program_id FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_metrics(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE impact_metrics (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_score INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_program_id FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_metrics(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE volunteer_metrics (
  volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  volunteer_name VARCHAR(255),
  hours_spent INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_program_id FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_metrics(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE donation_metrics (
  donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  donor_name VARCHAR(255),
  donation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  donation_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_program_id FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_metrics(program_id)
);
